column5: Hi folks, I'm looking for come plastics for my 997c head unit Any idea where I can get them in Canada ? I need the whole front plastic case and SD card door ( never clean with acetone   )  Thanks
Bay Distributors in North Bay will look after you.  Great folks to deal with.  http://www.bwmarineproducts.com/baydist.htm
They got almost everything.  And yes,great to deal with,and very reasonably priced.
Not unless you wanna glue it together.. but then I guess you know that now!  Like Lew said.. give Bay Distributors a call. They will take good care of you.
Great service received from Bay Distributors. Thanks for the tip guys !
Happy to hear it worked out for you, their a good outfit to deal with.

One of the best out there for sure. Blew the boards out of both of my brand new Canon downriggers from a lightning strike and dropped them at noon on a Friday. George worked the weekend and called me 9am on Monday to come back and get them !
Im sure there are alot of great stories about George and his service.  I needed some clutch springs brakes for my big jon riggers way back.2 days later,I had them.
